author: Luke Yee <lucyee01@meta.com>
description:
Hi Piotr,

Hope you are well in these interesting times. My name's Luke and I support Meta's Technical Leadership hiring and I wanted to reach out to you as your years in the industry shows you are someone who is working at the highest level of technical excellence. I also noticed you've interviewed with us before so I'm happy to discuss our options!

Priority Verticals:

  *   Llama 4: Check out the new features and capabilities of Llama 4 here<https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fai.meta.com%2Fblog%2Fllama-4-multimodal-intelligence%2F&h=AT1yo1kb6dtV1vADsHdm-n29qut-pnzq-etBuFbM9mvNLtilSrdM_b6niBOGlBcYlwgTR42uBf0WTiA0k3m7yR71el81KzNW9EGd22igGl7jpSd5fJ1dizR8MAUpUuzpaBD0yCbvlcoCM_owIAwnWRGcj_ySRdlspZKHs8YV2LE>
  *   Monetization & Ads: Marketing tools and ad solutions that helps take businesses to the next level here.<https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fbusiness.meta.com%2F%3Flocale%3Den_US&h=AT1HDaN2-hbzujWJrTFVeDr5mZgCBx_rDgQgvlqu1wMVA60FuAMoIwuIqM48RVAYygYOG5h
title: New Engineer Leadership Opportunities at Meta

description:

author: Arman Hossain <notifications@github.com>
description:
arman-bd left a comment (arman-bd/httpmorph#29)

@rumca-js, thank you for reporting this. I found the issue: it fails to decode gzip-compressed responses. I'm working on a fix and will add more test cases to prevent similar problems in the future.

-- 
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
https://github.com/arman-bd/httpmorph/issues/29#issuecomment-3508496744
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

Message ID: <arman-bd/httpmorph/issues/29/3508496744@github.com>
title: Re: [arman-bd/httpmorph] Response text returns junk (Issue #29)
